alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:07PM EST until March 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Winds will shift to the west Saturday morning. * WHERE...In Delaware, Inland Sussex. In New Jersey, Atlantic and Cape May. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The winds tonight will be associated with heavy rain and the chance of embedded thunderstorms. This could result in localized wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. A lull in the strongest winds is expected from around 4 AM to 7 AM before increasing again from the west.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
